channel.title: Serve-scape v1.1
channel.description:
well this is just a little more edited then v1 it still sucks i didn't care i am going to start again with a less buggy and better source so here it is my v1.1 serve-scape source nothing much
base: WinterLove v3
credits:
Mrs Extro Limited Graham Me Lmctruck taking BS and trying to remake it- epic fail! >.< Ultimate from rune-server for the banned and ipbanned ints so that you can't log on if your banned or ipbanned
well thats about it i guess nothing much handled skills, removed TPC, added a few other things well noob shit you know like all the allstar source that have objects moved thats really all i did this was like a 1 hour prject lol
Link: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mdz2zmwwjnd

item.title: Serve-scape v1.1
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

jmood128:

whats there to take a picture of a home? a skills? like get over your selfs and pictures also theres no rule stating i need pictures and if your going to say AMG ITS A VIRUS BAN HIM! AMG THIS IS A VIRUS DON"T DOWNLOAD just shut the fuck up like really? you can’t get a virus from .txt files the only way is if i had a .exe file that you hit and then that trigger the virus. but good news theres no .exe files its just a .rar file witch is what the server code is in and 2 .bat files witch compile and run also on another note why would i what nooby leechers to leech this from me? idc if you don’t download also i just didn’t really care about this

tis a virus laddies dun listen to mrs.dopedup

^^:) jking

Although i dont download sources unless the pictures look neat b.c i don’t like to download it, then explore etc and then a month later after i delete it cause it sucks, relalise i missed something which i woulda kept the server for

ETC ETC

anyway

gratz on the release.

Read full topic

item.title: Serve-scape v1.1
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

why should i care about rep its just a number and why do i need to take pictures its not like no ones seen Borat-Scape witch this is pritty much a look a like exepty the many missing features i just spent a little time adding a few things in its not like you guys don’t know that its just like czar but more stable theres really no need for pictures on a source thats mostly blank and lacks many features its more of a building block then anything theres npcs and shops and stuff but i didn’t take out >.< so ya its free i don’t really care about it was just a waste of about 4 hours of my time i could be doing better stuff

Read full topic
